titles.title: 10k Run for the Border Act
To amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to increase penalties for employing illegal aliens.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration, Citizenship, Refugees, Border Security, and International Law.

committee.subcommittee: Immigration, Citizenship, Refugees, Border Security, and International Law
committee.name: House Judiciary

bill.summary: 1/15/2009--Introduced. 10k Run for the Border Act - Amends the Immigration and Nationality Act to increase employer civil fines for: (1) hiring, or recruiting or referring for a fee, an alien that the employer knows is not authorized for employment; and (2) continuing to employ such alien. Sets forth a federal-state (and local) allocation of such additional penalty funds.
